name: India Chaat House & Restaurant
address: 14981 Marine Dr, White Rock, BC V4B 1C3, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Veg. Chowmein
hasMenuItem.description: Our style of Indian style made Chinese noodles with veggies and our undisclosed combination of spices.

hasMenuItem.name: House Spl Faluda Drink
hasMenuItem.description: A refreshing blend of rose syrup, vermicelli, basil seeds, and milk, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Tawa Tikki Chaat (2 Tikki)
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. This tangy and spicy Aloo Tikki Chaat is one of the fav chaat dishes, where crispy Aloo Tikkis are topped with Chutneys and radish.

hasMenuItem.name: Gulab Jamun (2 Pcs)
hasMenuItem.description: Soft, deep-fried milk solids soaked in sugar syrup, garnished with sliced almonds.

hasMenuItem.name: Chole Bhature
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Spiced chickpeas, served alongside Indian fried bread, yoghurt, pickles and onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Butter Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy tomato-based curry with tender chicken, infused with a delicate blend of aromatic Indian spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Noodle Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Our special Chowmein shaped in a patty inside the multigrain bun with veggies and sauces.

hasMenuItem.name: Chowmein & Manchurian Mix
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. The iconic duo which never gets old. Indian-style Chinese noodle topped with fried vegetable tangy flavored balls.

hasMenuItem.name: Plain Rice
hasMenuItem.description: Simply steamed, fluffy white rice - the perfect accompaniment for any dish.

hasMenuItem.name: Pav Bhaji
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy blend of mashed vegetables and spices, served with buttered bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Amritsari Aaloo Kulcha
hasMenuItem.description: Served with Chole, Raita, Achaar and Chutney.

hasMenuItem.name: Golgappa (8pcs)
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. "Hands-on" street food! - Crispy cracker balls stuffed with potatoes, chickpeas,  chutneys and served with spiced water. Must try!

hasMenuItem.name: Papdi Chaat with Bhalla
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Zingy Indian Nachos - Flour crackers topped with potatoes, chickpeas, yogurt, then served with sweet and spicy mint & tamarind chutneys and Bhelpuri. This one comes with lentil yoghurt balls!

hasMenuItem.name: Chilli Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Our famous Fries blended with spicy and tangy sauce with veggies topped with cheese.

hasMenuItem.name: Noodle Burger

hasMenuItem.name: Dahi Batata Puri

hasMenuItem.name: Tikki-Samosa Chaat with Chole
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Best from both worlds-our famous tiki samosa chaat consists of the potato-lentil fried patty and veggie-filled samosa topped with mint, yogurt, tamarind chatni and tangy masala.

hasMenuItem.name: Sev Puri
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Sweet and Sour mixture of all kinds of mixtures of rice crispies and sev mixed with our tamarind sauce!

hasMenuItem.name: Bhel Puri
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian.  Mumbai staple - A spiced mixture of mashed veggies served with two toasted buttery buns.

hasMenuItem.name: Veg Pakora
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Created by choosing ingredients, such as onion, eggplant, potato, spinach, plantain, paneer, cauliflower, tomato, or chili pepper. this is a serious MUST TRY!!

review.reviewBody: Fabulous chicken dish!  Kulfie ALWAYS a winner!
The food reminded me of the authentic food we get in India. Every flavor is well defined and they use aromatic spices too just how you would like it. Definitely worth it.
Superb food. Flavours are deep and delectable!

everything was delicious, but I'm always disappointed at the amount of chicken in the Butter chicken.  for the price I would expect the container to be filled high with chicken.  this definitely needs to be changed.
The Samosas and Tikki's were very cold when I received them however, the fries were piping hot. I'm not sure what happened.
